wmndsTableProps.name: hideHeader
wmndsTableProps.description: Determines whether to display a table header row (thead) at the top of the table. Set to false by default.

wmndsTableProps.name: headers
wmndsTableProps.description: Array of table head cells. Will not show if hideHeader is true.

wmndsTableProps.name: rows
wmndsTableProps.description: Required. Number of rows to include in the table

wmndsTableProps.name: cols
wmndsTableProps.description: Required. Number of columns to include in the table

wmndsTableProps.name: classNames
wmndsTableProps.description: Additional classes to add to the table container.

wmndsTableProps.name: cellClasses
wmndsTableProps.description: Additional classes to add to the table cells.

wmndsTableProps.name: values
wmndsTableProps.description: An array of values which will populate the table. See nunjucks markup for example.
